product_name: 83 Sportswear La Tour Eiffel Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Whether you're cycling the bike lanes of Paris or around your own neighborhood, you'll relish the joie de vivre of the women's La Tour Eiffel Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear. Polyester Euro-Mesh microfiber with Airdry Technology excels at wicking moisture and drying fast to keep you comfortable. Antimicrobial finish resists odors. Full-length, hidden front zipper gives you maximum venting options. Mesh side panels enhance ventilation. 3 rear pockets stash your snacks. Elastic hem helps keep the jersey in place. The 83 Sportswear La Tour Eiffel Bike Jersey for women features a slightly relaxed club-cut fit and a bold graphic design.
short_description: Whether you're cycling the bike lanes of Paris or around your own neighborhood, you'll relish the joie de vivre of the women's La Tour Eiffel Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear.
